Happy New Year! As we welcome in 2016 with a bang, us here at Mainframe debate wanted to first take a look back at the year that was in Mainframe. Here are the top 15 moments that defined mainframe in 2015 and have set the stage for an exciting 2016.

# Working Ideas

  • Launch of LinuxOne (#1)
  • Death of Gene Amdalh (#2)
  • Launch of z13: Arrival of zSystems (#5)
  • Big Data Community Catches Onto Mainframes (#4)
  • CA Gets New Mainframe GM: Ashok Reddy (#8)
  • z/OS Gets New Pricing Model (#3)
  • Millennials Aim to Master the Mainframe (#10)
  • z/VSE FINALLY gets a pair of New CICS (#7)
  • 88% of CIOs Choose Mainframe as Growth Continues (#5)
  • Haters Gonna Hate...and remain wrong! (#12)
  • Ubuntu, KVM, and Spark Join the Party (#6)
  • As Security Concerns Rise, Mainframe Shines (#11)
  • BlueMix brings Mainframe power to the Cloud (#13)
  • Mainframe Gets a Movie (#9)
  • Migration? A Fools Errand. (#15)
